Chemicals Manager v2.0

Application Guide

PART I: GENERAL INFORMATION

1. Chemical Manager is a database management application designed to ADD, EDIT, DELETE, and COUNT STOCK for the chemical fridge and chemical closet.
2. The application will allow you to manage the database, print yellow labels and stock reports

PART II: HOW TO USE

1. Download the application
2. Set all the settings according to PART V
3. Run Chemicals-Manager.exe file

PART III: MAIN MENU

1. PRINT YELLOW LABEL
 1.1. This will allow you to add a new LOT NUMBER to the database by filling a form
 1.2. At the end of the form press Y to submit the form and the new LOT NUMBER will be added to the database
 1.3. When form is successfully submitted the application will open bar tender to print a yellow label
2. EDIT
 2.1. This will allow you to edit an existing PART NUMBER by filling a form
 2.2. At the end of the form press Y to submit the form and the user information will be edited
3. DELETE
 3.1. This will allow you to delete an existing LOT or PART NUMBER
 3.2. Insert a valid LOT or PART NUMBER to delete
4. STOCK-COUNT
 4.1. Will allow you to count the current stock

PART IV: SCRIPT

-N/A-

PART V: SETTINGS

1. Database location --> The location of the database. For example: database.db
2. Yellow Label filename --> yellow lbl.btw
3. Yellow Label CSV --> yellow lbl.csv

PART VI: RELATED FILES

1. Yellow Label.btw a bartender file
2. CSV file for the Yellow label to print from
3. Database file to keep all the relevant data
